SummaryEnglish: The majority of the Matsuno household is comprised of six identical siblings: self-centered leader Osomatsu, manly Karamatsu, voice of reason Choromatsu, cynical Ichimatsu, hyperactive Juushimatsu, and lovable Todomatsu. Despite each one of them being over the age of 20, they are incredibly lazy and have absolutely no motivation to get a job, choosing to live as NEETs instead. In the rare occurrence that they try to look for employment and are somehow able to land an interview, their unique personalities generally lead to their swift rejection. From trying to pick up girlfriends to finding the perfect job, the daily activities of the Matsuno brothers are never dull as they go on all sorts of crazy, and often downright bizarre, adventures. Though they desperately search for a way to improve their social standing, it won't be possible if they can't survive the various challenges that come with being sextuplets!

2.TitleEnglish: Mr. Osomatsu Short Film Series - Word Chain Game

3.TitleEnglish: Mr. Osomatsu Short Film Series - Osomatsu Blaster

4.TitleEnglish: Mr. Osomatsu Short Film Series - Kara & Todo Rhythm

5.TitleEnglish: Mr. Osomatsu Short Film Series - Robomatsu-san

6.TitleEnglish: Mr. Osomatsu Short Film Series - An Idle Chat

7.TitleEnglish: Mr. Osomatsu Short Film Series - A Journey On The Seibu-Shinjuku Line

8.TitleEnglish: Mr. Osomatsu Short Film Series - Words and Music

9.TitleEnglish: Mr. Osomatsu Short Film Series - All Shehs

10.SummaryEnglish: A series of horse racing skits produced in collaboration with the Japan Racing Association. The brothers take Totoko to her first horse race, but have trouble getting her to understand how betting actually works.

24.SummaryEnglish: The sextuplets attend a high school class reunion. There, they see all their former classmates who have become "proper" adults with company jobs. The sextuplets sulk about this and go home and drink until they fall asleep. But when they wake up, a certain scene awaits them.

25.TitleEnglish: Mr. Osomatsu: The Hipipo Tribe and the Glistening Fruit

32.TitleEnglish: Mr. Osomatsu: The Soul's Takoyaki Party and the Legendary Sleepover Party
32.SummaryEnglish: The sextuplets are prepping for a takoyaki-cooking party at their home, before everything goes haywire when Totoko implies a sleepover.

1.SummaryEnglish: The majority of the Matsuno household is comprised of six identical siblings: self-centered leader Osomatsu, manly Karamatsu, voice of reason Choromatsu, cynical Ichimatsu, hyperactive Juushimatsu, and lovable Todomatsu. Despite each one of them being over the age of 20, they are incredibly lazy and have absolutely no motivation to get a job, choosing to live as NEETs instead. In the rare occurrence that they try to look for employment and are somehow able to land an interview, their unique personalities generally lead to their swift rejection.
The popular Osomatsu brothers are now back?! However, times have changed and the sextuplets try to figure out the best way to come back that will appeal to the current TV audience...

2.TitleEnglish: Let's Get a Job / The Melancholy of Osomatsu
2.SummaryEnglish: The sextuplets attempt to find a job, and Osomatsu tries to find where all of his brothers went off to.

3.SummaryEnglish: This week's episode is the tidbits collection. Everything from Dekapan-man, to what happens if you try to horde your pachinko winnings, to a bath house quiz.

4.TitleEnglish: Let's Become Independent / This Is Totoko
4.SummaryEnglish: Choromatsu is worried that his brothers are depending too much on their parents.

5.SummaryEnglish: Karamatsu is taken hostage and demands the Matsuno brothers pay off their tab for his oden stand.

6.TitleEnglish: It's a Birthday Party, Dajo / Iyami's Great Discovery
6.SummaryEnglish: The Matsunos are invited to Hatabou's birthday party, becoming surprised to discover he is living the rich life.

7.TitleEnglish: Todomatsu and the Five Demons / Four / Going North
7.SummaryEnglish: Todomatsu faces the biggest threat to his social life when his brothers show up at his workplace just as his co-workers are about to invite him to a mixer.

8.SummaryEnglish: Osomatsu plays as a detective who calms down people working on murder cases with his buffoonery instead of actually solving them.

9.TitleEnglish: Chibita and Oden / Jyushimatsu Falls in Love
9.SummaryEnglish: While discussing his career plans, Karamatsu somehow winds up as Chibita's apprentice at his oden stand.

10.SummaryEnglish: Looking to earn some easy money, Iyami and Chibita set up their own "Rental Girlfriend" business, which gets no business due to how ugly they look.

11.TitleEnglish: Black Santa / Picked Up by a Girl / The Perfect Christmas / Exchanging Presents / Christmas Drinking / Groveling
11.SummaryEnglish: A series of Christmas-themed skits. Ichimatsu takes on the role of a Black Santa interrupting a romantic couple's date, while Karamatsu finds himself on a date with an unfortunate ending.

12.SummaryEnglish: Recap episode. Osomatsu and Totoko host an end-of-the-year special broadcast, looking back on previous episodes.

13.SummaryEnglish: This episode features a down-on-his-luck salaryman named Sanematsu who faces hardships from his co-workers, and imaginary sextuplet brothers. Also, genderbent versions of the Matsuno siblings argue with each other over guys.

14.TitleEnglish: We Caught a Cold / Todomatsu's Line / Choromatsu-sensei
14.SummaryEnglish: The brothers all catch colds, with whoever's left healthy causing a lot of trouble while trying to take care of the others.

15.TitleEnglish: Interview / The Life of Chibita's Flower
15.SummaryEnglish: Jyushimatsu goes to a job interview, proving to be a total nuisance for the interviewers, while the Girlymatsu sisters try to pass the time while on vacation.

16.SummaryEnglish: In a post-apocalyptic world, the Idol Matsunos battle against Iyami and Dekapan, who are robbing the dry-skinned citizens of all of their lotion.

17.SummaryEnglish: A series of skits all revolving around Jyushimatsu's odd personality as well as the brothers' view on him.

18.SummaryEnglish: Wanting to become the main protagonist of the franchise again, Iyami holds a bizarre kart race to determine who the protagonist of Osomatsu-san will be.

19.SummaryEnglish: The concept of a Hijirisawa Shōnosuke-san anime quickly gets dropped due to lack of ideas, replaced with a series of skits set during the Sengoku era.

20.TitleEnglish: Teach Me, Hatabou / School Master / Iyami's School
20.SummaryEnglish: Kicked out of his own company, Hatabou starts his own catering service in order to regain his fortune, leaving the Matsuno siblings curious about what meat he has been using.

21.SummaryEnglish: On a rainy evening, the brothers play a game of mahjong, with each brother showing his own strengths and glaring weaknesses.

22.TitleEnglish: The Star of Hope, Todomatsu / Final Sheeeh
22.SummaryEnglish: Todomatsu holds auditions to take one of his brothers with him to a mixer, struggling to find anyone worth taking.

23.SummaryEnglish: When the family heater runs out of kerosene, the brothers find themselves in an underground village populated by a tribe of Dayon people.

24.SummaryEnglish: Totoko experiences jealousy for the first time after people start getting more success than her, leading her on a quest to find an oil magnate to marry.

25.SummaryEnglish: The brothers quickly abandon their new lifestyles upon learning they have been invited to a baseball tournament. After failing miserably the first time, the family soon grow stronger and reach the final round of the next tournament. Facing off against a ruthless team of aliens that murder the rest of their team, the brothers are spurned on by the chance to lose their virginities, but end up losing anyway.

1.SummaryEnglish: Learning about Mr. Osomatsu's second season, the sextuplets of the past decide to see how they've turned out in the future.

2.SummaryEnglish: The brothers are pressured by their parents to find a job, the siblings try their hand at internet streaming, only to get flagged for their inappropriate actions. Later, Iyami uses an experimental detergent made by Dekapan to keep his suit clean for a party. However, it ends up getting drunk by the siblings, causing them to turn invisible down to their organs. As a result, they attempt to paint each others bodies, becoming upset that noone notices anything different about them.

3.SummaryEnglish: Being the only two alone in the house, Choromatsu and Ichimatsu struggle to make conversation with each other. Later, Totoko takes part in an eating contest but keeps getting distracted by the brothers getting attention from the celebrity MC, Shōei.

4.SummaryEnglish: Noticing Matsuzou acting strangely, the siblings discover that he is worried that there's not enough spark in his marriage with Matsuyo. Feeling he should return to a more innocent time, the boys give Matsuzou a masterlcass in being a virgin, albeit with no success. Matsuzou inevitably resorts to getting a love potion from Dekapan, but ultimately decides against using it, managing to sort things out with Matsuyo by himself.

5.SummaryEnglish: A series of summer-themed skits. Jyushimatsu takes part in radio exercises, Iyami and Chibita try to beat the heat, Todomatsu keeps finding himself exiled by his brothers, Karamatsu tries to inject summer into everyone's lives, and the sextuplets attempt to talk to girls on the beach.

6.TitleEnglish: Iyami Has Arrived / I Want Friends, Jo
6.SummaryEnglish: Iyami goes to sextuplets for help after falling on hard times and Hatabou searches for a friend.

7.SummaryEnglish: In a parody of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, Emperor Osomatsu and a group of bizarre generals attempt to take over the country. Meanwhile, in the real world, Osomatsu joins Todomatsu at a mixer, struggling to keep his perverted instincts in check.

8.TitleEnglish: Synthesis / Jyushimatsu and the Dolphin / Totoko and Nyaa
8.SummaryEnglish: Dayon uses Dekapan's latest invention to merge various people together into new beings, with a fiendish end goal in mind. Jyushimatsu becomes determined to get a job at a sea park as an actual dolphin, receiving strict training from a female trainer. Meanwhile, Totoko and Nyaa encounter each other at Chibita's oden stand.

9.SummaryEnglish: Ichimatsu struggles to get any sleep with his brothers being noisy all night and refusing to turn off the light. Unable to take anymore, Ichimatsu starts monitoring the brothers' courtesy towards each other, leading Osomatsu to get criticized the most. Later, Iyami proves his skills at the arcades by playing games at their highest difficulty.

10.TitleEnglish: Karamatsu and Brother / New Employee Totoko / Dubbingmatsu-san
10.SummaryEnglish: Karamatsu tries to take on various requests from everyone to look like a reliable brother, only to take on more than he can handle, so Choromatsu tries to teach him how to refuse. Totoko begins working at a company, proving to be a handful for her superior Todomatsu. Later, a pair of seiyuu attend a dubbing session of an episode of Mr. Osomatsu, witnessing how the sextuplets do their work.

11.SummaryEnglish: Already angered over the siblings gambling instead of paying off their oden tab, Chibita vows revenge on them after they pluck out his one-and-only hair. That night, Chibita begins taking out the siblings on by one, shaving all of their hair and stuffing oden in their faces.

12.TitleEnglish: Totoko and Nyaa 3 / The Eitaro Family / Give Them Back / Totoko and Nyaa 4
12.SummaryEnglish: Jyushimatsu befriends a young boy named Eitarou but gets called in by Eitarou's mother when he starts imitating him. Contrary to Jyushimatsu's fears, however, she asks him to teach Eitarou jokes so he can make friends at school. Later, Dayon steals Dekapan's underwear, forcing him to give chase all over the city while butt naked.

13.SummaryEnglish: A series of end-of-year skits. Osomatsu and Choromatsu try to do one thing that could make them say they had a good year. Ichimatsu gets persuaded to take part in a lottery, Dekapan and Dayon pound mochi together, Hatobou gets pestered by some greedy Jizou statues, Choromatsu sends some untruthful New Years' cards. Todomatsu is fired from the Matsuno family and is forced to try out for a reserve team.

14.TitleEnglish: Weekly Drama Serial - Sanematsu-san: Episode 9 / UMA Expedition Team / The Choromatsu Incident
14.SummaryEnglish: Sanematsu wakes up in Osomatsu's world as the seventh Matsuno brother. After spending several weeks of happiness with the siblings, Sanematsu eventually realises it was all a delusion he had been experiencing after ending up in a car accident. Jyushimatsu, Iyami, and Hatabou go on an expedition to find a Super Mongolian Death Worm. Choromatsu changes up his image by dying his hair brown, making it hard for his brothers to tell him that it's doesn't actually make him look cool.

15.SummaryEnglish: The brothers struggle to remove the lid off of a particularly stubborn jar. Karamatsu runs his own taxi service, proving to have no idea what he is doing when he picks up an office lady. Finally, Totty holds a quiz for his brothers, containing several questions without right answers.

16.TitleEnglish: Space Pirates / Gourmet Round / The Cutie Next Door
16.SummaryEnglish: A group of aliens pursue the legendary space pirate, Shazarr. Displeased with Chibita's oden, Matsuzou serves up his own brand of oden, only for noone to show up. Later, the sextuplets become enamored by their new neighbor, Kinko Inuyama, prompting jealousy from Totoko when they go on a date with Kinko instead of her.

17.SummaryEnglish: Ichimatsu becomes paranoid when lucky things happen to him all day, so he and Jyushimatsu try to punish themselves to balance things out. A lovey-dovey couple go to a hot spring inn that's haunted by a zashiki-warashi named Osoma.

18.SummaryEnglish: Iyami comes across a blind flower girl named Okiku and, despite being poor himself, tries to help her raise money for eye surgery. Failing to win a wrestling match due to interference from Chibita, who develops a crush on Okiku, Iyami begins working an earnest living to raise the money. With Iyami still falling way short of the surgery bill, Chibita tries to give the remaining money under the pretense of a robbery, only to wind up getting him implicated as an actual robber. However, the rest of the town comes to Iyami and he manages to get the money over to Okiku before he gets caught. Years later, after finally being released from prison, Iyami is relieved to see Okiku now living a normal life as a florist.

19.SummaryEnglish: After Dekapan becomes president, his secretary Todomatsu tries to keep him from pressing the Big Red Button. Iyami attempts to pull off a sham ventriloquism scheme by having Chibita and Hatabou act as his puppets. On Valentine's Day, the brothers try in vain to get some Valentine's chocolate from someone.

20.SummaryEnglish: Yet another collection of random skits. Chibita tries selling some sextuplet meats buns, Choromatsu files his taxes, Osomatsu accuses his brothers of stealing his wallet, a fierce wave of pollen hits town, Totoko tries to escape a creepy maze, Jyushimatsu becomes a raccoon, Todomatsu tries doing something crazy, kindergartners visit a bread factory, the Proper-Rangers prepare to set off, and Osomatsu takes part in a skeleton event.

21.TitleEnglish: The Late Night Himatsuya / BANANA / NEET Correctional Facility
21.SummaryEnglish: The brothers get rowdy while getting drunk at a restaurant. Unemployed office lady Totomi ends up taking a job at a strange establishment that offers some peculiar services. After being visited by a salesman, Matsuyo contemplates sending off one of her sons to a NEET correctional facility, asking Choromatsu to help her decide which one to send away.

22.SummaryEnglish: Osomatsu and his friends decided to go on an overseas trip by Hatabo's plane. However, the plane crashed on the way, and I arrived at the place ...

23.TitleEnglish: The Late Night Himatsuya / Dayon and Dayon / Iyami-san Is Troubled
23.SummaryEnglish: A common scene after a drinking party. Osomatsu and others are sloppy at Ramen Himatsuya. The second. / The life of Dayon, which has been a mystery until now, is revealed! !! And another Dayon appears in front of Dayon! ?? / Recently, Iyami who has lost confidence in doing Osomatsu-san. I consulted with the program producer, but ... / A common scene after a drinking party. Osomatsu and others are sloppy at Ramen Himatsuya. 3rd.

24.SummaryEnglish: Matsuzou becomes hospitalized, leading the brothers to seriously think about their lives and get proper jobs to support their family. As Osomatsu starts to find this new life boring, Totoko encourages him to think for himself.

25.SummaryEnglish: Osomatsu's big announcement to his brothers is interrupted when Iyami crashes a plane into their house, killing them all and sending them to the underworld. Brought before King Enma, the brothers fail to come up with a good reason why they should go to Heaven and ultimately wind up in Hell. Just as the brothers realize they are still virgins, Totoko and the others, aided by the spirit of Fujio Akatsuka, dive into Hell to bring them back. Receiving further help from other dead allies, the brothers manage to escape Hell and return to life, although they are not exactly happy with the state of their bodies.

3.SummaryEnglish: »Osomatsu-san« startet in die 3. Staffel – doch leider ohne seinen Haupt-Cast! Unsere NEETs wurden aus ihrem eigenen Anime geworfen und durch brave und wohlerzogene Strahlemänner ersetzt. Das wollen die sechs natürlich nicht auf sich sitzen lassen, doch was sollen sie gegen ihren eigenen Produzenten tun? So muss die Gruppe erst einmal ihren Anime zurückerobern, um wieder ihr altbekanntes Chaos zu stiften!

1.SummaryEnglish: That "Osomatsu-san" is back again !! It's a very good work, harmless, no one is hurt, all the characters have a good personality, and it's a perfect Japanimation that can be recommended as an educational program ... This is that Is it "Osomatsu-san" ...?

2.SummaryEnglish: The Matsus welcome a pair of AI to help them with their daily lives, but do these AI have ulterior motives?

3.SummaryEnglish: The sextuplets continue to enjoy all the advantages of having handy AI around, but things start to go south when the AI start to point out all the flaws their friends have.

4.TitleEnglish: Ichimatsu Radio / Unit Formed / Matsuyo's Trap
4.SummaryEnglish: de midnight. Ichimatsu, who took out the radio cassette player, started talking! ?? / Ichimatsu secretly had a radio show and the sextuplets try to outsmart their mother to get their hands on some instant noodles. / hungry six children play a game at midnight!

5.SummaryEnglish: is lost in thought. The reason is the drug store in the neighborhood ...? / Todomatsu and Karamatsu fall in love with a drug store employee and the boys go to a wedding.

6.SummaryEnglish: Iyami tries to lure the boys into an interesting shop / the Riceballs try to achieve optimization / Jyushimatsu gives Osomatsu a special massage.

7.SummaryEnglish: Another tidbits collection is here! Astronauts, yokai, and Governor Jyushimatsu await.

8.SummaryEnglish: Choromatsu drags his brothers to Mount Takao for some bonding time. / A turbulent journey of six children to Mt. Takao.

9.SummaryEnglish: Twin AI robots who don't understand the meaning of Shah ... / Totoko and Nya have a quarrel over costumes ...! / The NEETs finally realize how hard household chores can be.

10.SummaryEnglish: Iyami challenges the huge athletic tournament "ZANSU". That character that appeared there! ?? Karamatsu in a / Before "Among Us," there was the Werewolf game. Will the Calming Detective Osomatsu be able to track down the real werewolf?

11.SummaryEnglish: was a twin AI robot that finally thought that he understood "Shae" ... / The sextuplets try to decide on hypothetical pizza.

12.SummaryEnglish: The Riceballs are replaced with another AI when they fail to do their job and the sextuplets go to look for them.

13.SummaryEnglish: Salmon and Pickled Plum look back on the last 2.5 seasons of "Mr. Osomatsu."

14.TitleEnglish: Pond Smelt Fishing / Mortal Combat / Sparkle Phantom Stream
14.SummaryEnglish: The six children came to smelt fishing, but every time they caught a fish, a mysterious event happened ...! ?? / One day when a lot of snow was piled up, a snowball hit the back of Osomatsu. Everything started from there ...! / Choromatsu tries to find his calling in life.

15.SummaryEnglish: The Matsus cosplay and do a variety of tidbits!

16.SummaryEnglish: A collection of six children who have become various professions. / It's the Invasion of the Body Snatchers and the world's only hope is the sextuplets' dad and Iyami...

17.SummaryEnglish: Akatsuka City, a city of crime in the near future. Labor reforms in this city were underway, and office peace was about to be deprived. One day, he succeeded in developing a real cup, a Robo employee who faithfully follows only orders. / The sextuplets try to figure out what the hell imoni is.

18.SummaryEnglish: Nyaa has a rather surprising crush that happens to be Osomatsu and literally everyone tries to stop her from making a terrible life choice.

19.TitleEnglish: Are They Disbanding? / Sumo Stable / Dogs
19.SummaryEnglish: A1 Grand Prix qualifying begins, but Omusubi can't think of anything at all. We both started to get frustrated ... / a new wrestler who entered the "Sumo Room" Sumo Room "Matsu Room". The brothers struggle to make a full-fledged sumo wrestler, but Todomatsu is ...!? Jyushimatsu is having fun playing with the ... / Jyushimatsu gets to find out what it's like to be a dog.

20.TitleEnglish: Choromatsu Memorial Hall / Ear Cleaning / Persimmons
20.SummaryEnglish: the partition that was in the eat-in of the convenience store has disappeared, something is completely visible. / A memorial hall where all of Choromatsu meet together. For some reason, there is a sea lion pine in such a memorial hall ... !! / Welcome to the Matsuno Choromatsu Memorial Hall.

21.SummaryEnglish: Choromatsu and Ichimatsu in the eat-in. I wonder how long I can stay there ... / Omusubi who finished the comedy live. I decided to fix the material in the dressing room ... / You've heard of Cinderella, but have you heard of Totoderella?

22.TitleEnglish: I Found This / Wanabe Detectives / Hide-and-Seek
22.SummaryEnglish: Fourteen pine trees that picked up 100 yen. He makes a serious decision after this ...! ?? / There were two famous detectives at a police station in a hurry. Its names are Oso and Juicy. They were chasing dangerous incidents from various angles today too !! / There are a couple of wannabe detectives and the sextuplets play an epic game of hide and seek.

23.SummaryEnglish: The main players of "Osomatsu-san" are going to renew the contract with the production committee for next season, but the six children are evaluating the success of this season. / Buying " Six children heading to a clothing store to buy new clothes. What kind of new costume will you buy ...! ?? / Choromatsu and a friend recall their high school days and a secret they had left behind.

24.TitleEnglish: New Osomatsu Returns / A-1 Grand Prix
24.SummaryEnglish: The new Osomatsu that was buried in the first episode of the third season is back . What remains after the epic revenge ...!? / endless challenge of artificial intelligence "A-1 Grand Prix". The stage of the final has finally started! The finalist also has the appearance of Omusubi ...

25.SummaryEnglish: Six children in pajamas. There is nothing to do in the final episode. For the time being, I change my clothes and go out ...

2.SummaryEnglish: The sextuplets suddenly get a craving for watermelon.

4.SummaryEnglish: The sextuplets and their friends get ready for a temple festival.

5.SummaryEnglish: The sextuplets need some rest after the last episode and then Karamatsu and Todomatsu meet a fishing hermit.

6.SummaryEnglish: The sextuplets travel back in time to get themselves a working fan after theirs broke.

7.SummaryEnglish: Let's see some classic fairytales, Mr. Osomatsu style.

8.SummaryEnglish: A thieving cat is rampaging through the shopping district. While the store owners have a hard time dealing with it, Totoko's family fish shop is also affected, and even the sextuplets can't keep quiet. What is Ichimatsu thinking about this situation?

9.SummaryEnglish: The hot days are still continuing... At this time of year when the heat can make it hard to concentrate, we bring you a collection of short stories that you won't get bored of!

10.TitleEnglish: Iyami and the Shy Little Alien
10.SummaryEnglish: In the space age, there are now many space travelers and aliens living on Earth. Meanwhile, Iyami opens a new "space cafe." The cafe, where aliens serve customers, is booming, but it seems the staff have some kind of secret...

11.TitleEnglish: The Sextuplets Have the Same Dream
11.SummaryEnglish: The Matsuno sextuplets were born on the same day and look the same, but for some reason, they sometimes experience strange synchronization phenomena.

12.SummaryEnglish: The end of summer arrives and Chibita reveals a new goal.
